attributes.action: Declare the vote to leave the EU void due to misleading campaign information.
attributes.background:
BREXIT campaigners argued that to leave the EU would save £350m/week which could be spent on improving our NHS. 
(a)This figure was inaccurate and therefore misleading as confirmed by the Statistics Commission; (b) Nigel Farage now admits that there is no guarantee of additional funding for the NHS
